Define Documentation

#define delim_strcat ( buf,
max_size,
str,
delim,
use_delim   ) 
Value:
if ( use_delim ) {                                      \
                strncat( buf, delim, max_size );                \
                max_size -= strlen(delim);                      \
        }                                                       \
        strncat( buf, str, max_size );                          \
        max_size -= strlen(str);                                \
        use_delim = 1;
